00055 static float mix_weight(float weight, float weight2, char mix_mode)
00056 {
00057 #if 0
00058     /*
00059      * XXX Don't know why, but the switch version takes many CPU time,
00060      *     and produces lag in realtime playback...
00061      */
00062     switch (mix_mode)
00063     {
00064     case MOD_WVG_MIX_ADD:
00065         return (weight + weight2);
00066     case MOD_WVG_MIX_SUB:
00067         return (weight - weight2);
00068     case MOD_WVG_MIX_MUL:
00069         return (weight * weight2);
00070     case MOD_WVG_MIX_DIV:
00071         /* Avoid dividing by zero (or really small values). */
00072         if (0.0 <= weight2 < MOD_WVG_ZEROFLOOR)
00073             weight2 = MOD_WVG_ZEROFLOOR;
00074         else if (-MOD_WVG_ZEROFLOOR < weight2)
00075             weight2 = -MOD_WVG_ZEROFLOOR;
00076         return (weight / weight2);
00077     case MOD_WVG_MIX_DIF:
00078         return (weight < weight2 ? weight2 - weight : weight - weight2);
00079     case MOD_WVG_MIX_AVG:
00080         return (weight + weight2) / 2.0;
00081     case MOD_WVG_MIX_SET:
00082     default:
00083         return weight2;
00084     }
00085 #endif
00086     if (mix_mode == MOD_WVG_MIX_SET)
00087         return weight2;
00088     else if (mix_mode == MOD_WVG_MIX_ADD)
00089         return (weight + weight2);
00090     else if (mix_mode == MOD_WVG_MIX_SUB)
00091         return (weight - weight2);
00092     else if (mix_mode == MOD_WVG_MIX_MUL)
00093         return (weight * weight2);
00094     else if (mix_mode == MOD_WVG_MIX_DIV) {
00095         /* Avoid dividing by zero (or really small values). */
00096         if (weight2 < 0.0f && weight2 > -MOD_WVG_ZEROFLOOR)
00097             weight2 = -MOD_WVG_ZEROFLOOR;
00098         else if (weight2 >= 0.0f && weight2 < MOD_WVG_ZEROFLOOR)
00099             weight2 = MOD_WVG_ZEROFLOOR;
00100         return (weight / weight2);
00101     }
00102     else if (mix_mode == MOD_WVG_MIX_DIF)
00103         return (weight < weight2 ? weight2 - weight : weight - weight2);
00104     else if (mix_mode == MOD_WVG_MIX_AVG)
00105         return (weight + weight2) * 0.5f;
00106     else return weight2;
00107 }

00109 /**************************************
00110  * Modifiers functions.               *
00111  **************************************/
00112 static void initData(ModifierData *md)
00113 {
00114     WeightVGMixModifierData *wmd = (WeightVGMixModifierData*) md;
00115 
00116     wmd->default_weight_a       = 0.0f;
00117     wmd->default_weight_b       = 0.0f;
00118     wmd->mix_mode               = MOD_WVG_MIX_SET;
00119     wmd->mix_set                = MOD_WVG_SET_AND;
00120 
00121     wmd->mask_constant          = 1.0f;
00122     wmd->mask_tex_use_channel   = MOD_WVG_MASK_TEX_USE_INT; /* Use intensity by default. */
00123     wmd->mask_tex_mapping       = MOD_DISP_MAP_LOCAL;
00124 }
00125 
00126 static void copyData(ModifierData *md, ModifierData *target)
00127 {
00128     WeightVGMixModifierData *wmd  = (WeightVGMixModifierData*) md;
00129     WeightVGMixModifierData *twmd = (WeightVGMixModifierData*) target;
00130 
00131     BLI_strncpy(twmd->defgrp_name_a, wmd->defgrp_name_a, sizeof(twmd->defgrp_name_a));
00132     BLI_strncpy(twmd->defgrp_name_b, wmd->defgrp_name_b, sizeof(twmd->defgrp_name_b));
00133     twmd->default_weight_a       = wmd->default_weight_a;
00134     twmd->default_weight_b       = wmd->default_weight_b;
00135     twmd->mix_mode               = wmd->mix_mode;
00136     twmd->mix_set                = wmd->mix_set;
00137 
00138     twmd->mask_constant          = wmd->mask_constant;
00139     BLI_strncpy(twmd->mask_defgrp_name, wmd->mask_defgrp_name, sizeof(twmd->mask_defgrp_name));
00140     twmd->mask_texture           = wmd->mask_texture;
00141     twmd->mask_tex_use_channel   = wmd->mask_tex_use_channel;
00142     twmd->mask_tex_mapping       = wmd->mask_tex_mapping;
00143     twmd->mask_tex_map_obj       = wmd->mask_tex_map_obj;
00144     BLI_strncpy(twmd->mask_tex_uvlayer_name, wmd->mask_tex_uvlayer_name, sizeof(twmd->mask_tex_uvlayer_name));
00145 }
00146 
00147 static CustomDataMask requiredDataMask(Object *UNUSED(ob), ModifierData *md)
00148 {
00149     WeightVGMixModifierData *wmd = (WeightVGMixModifierData*) md;
00150     CustomDataMask dataMask = 0;
00151 
00152     /* We need vertex groups! */
00153     dataMask |= CD_MASK_MDEFORMVERT;
00154 
00155     /* Ask for UV coordinates if we need them. */
00156     if (wmd->mask_tex_mapping == MOD_DISP_MAP_UV)
00157         dataMask |= CD_MASK_MTFACE;
00158 
00159     /* No need to ask for CD_PREVIEW_MLOOPCOL... */
00160 
00161     return dataMask;
00162 }

00164 static int dependsOnTime(ModifierData *md)
00165 {
00166     WeightVGMixModifierData *wmd = (WeightVGMixModifierData*) md;
00167 
00168     if (wmd->mask_texture)
00169         return BKE_texture_dependsOnTime(wmd->mask_texture);
00170     return 0;
00171 }

00173 static void foreachObjectLink(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00174                               void (*walk)(void *userData, Object *ob, Object **obpoin),
00175                               void *userData)
00176 {
00177     WeightVGMixModifierData *wmd = (WeightVGMixModifierData*) md;
00178     walk(userData, ob, &wmd->mask_tex_map_obj);
00179 }

00181 static void foreachIDLink(ModifierData *md, Object *ob, IDWalkFunc walk, void *userData)
00182 {
00183     WeightVGMixModifierData *wmd = (WeightVGMixModifierData*) md;
00184 
00185     walk(userData, ob, (ID **)&wmd->mask_texture);
00186 
00187     foreachObjectLink(md, ob, (ObjectWalkFunc)walk, userData);
00188 }

00190 static void foreachTexLink(ModifierData *md, Object *ob, TexWalkFunc walk, void *userData)
00191 {
00192     walk(userData, ob, md, "mask_texture");
00193 }

00195 static void updateDepgraph(ModifierData *md, DagForest *forest, struct Scene *UNUSED(scene),
00196                            Object *UNUSED(ob), DagNode *obNode)
00197 {
00198     WeightVGMixModifierData *wmd = (WeightVGMixModifierData*) md;
00199     DagNode *curNode;
00200 
00201     if (wmd->mask_tex_map_obj && wmd->mask_tex_mapping == MOD_DISP_MAP_OBJECT) {
00202         curNode = dag_get_node(forest, wmd->mask_tex_map_obj);
00203 
00204         dag_add_relation(forest, curNode, obNode, DAG_RL_DATA_DATA|DAG_RL_OB_DATA,
00205                          "WeightVGMix Modifier");
00206     }
00207 
00208     if (wmd->mask_tex_mapping == MOD_DISP_MAP_GLOBAL)
00209         dag_add_relation(forest, obNode, obNode, DAG_RL_DATA_DATA|DAG_RL_OB_DATA,
00210                          "WeightVGMix Modifier");
00211 }
00212 
00213 static int isDisabled(ModifierData *md, int UNUSED(useRenderParams))
00214 {
00215     WeightVGMixModifierData *wmd = (WeightVGMixModifierData*) md;
00216     /* If no vertex group, bypass. */
00217     return (wmd->defgrp_name_a[0] == '\0');
00218 }
00219 
00220 static DerivedMesh *applyModifier(ModifierData *md, Object *ob, DerivedMesh *derivedData,
00221                                   int UNUSED(useRenderParams), int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00222 {
00223     WeightVGMixModifierData *wmd = (WeightVGMixModifierData*) md;
00224     DerivedMesh *dm = derivedData;
00225     MDeformVert *dvert = NULL;
00226     MDeformWeight **dw1, **tdw1, **dw2, **tdw2;
00227     int numVerts;
00228     int defgrp_idx, defgrp_idx2 = -1;
00229     float *org_w;
00230     float *new_w;
00231     int *tidx, *indices = NULL;
00232     int numIdx = 0;
00233     int i;
00234     /* Flags. */
00235 #if 0
00236     int do_prev = (wmd->modifier.mode & eModifierMode_DoWeightPreview);
00237 #endif
00238 
00239     /* Get number of verts. */
00240     numVerts = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00241 
00242     /* Check if we can just return the original mesh.
00243      * Must have verts and therefore verts assigned to vgroups to do anything useful!
00244      */
00245     if ((numVerts == 0) || (ob->defbase.first == NULL))
00246         return dm;
00247 
00248     /* Get vgroup idx from its name. */
00249     defgrp_idx = defgroup_name_index(ob, wmd->defgrp_name_a);
00250     if (defgrp_idx < 0)
00251         return dm;
00252     /* Get seconf vgroup idx from its name, if given. */
00253     if (wmd->defgrp_name_b[0] != (char)0) {
00254         defgrp_idx2 = defgroup_name_index(ob, wmd->defgrp_name_b);
00255         if (defgrp_idx2 < 0)
00256             return dm;
00257     }
00258 
00259     dvert = CustomData_duplicate_referenced_layer(&dm->vertData, CD_MDEFORMVERT, numVerts);
00260     /* If no vertices were ever added to an object's vgroup, dvert might be NULL. */
00261     if (!dvert)
00262         /* If not affecting all vertices, just return. */
00263         if (wmd->mix_set != MOD_WVG_SET_ALL)
00264             return dm;
00265         /* Else, add a valid data layer! */
00266         dvert = CustomData_add_layer_named(&dm->vertData, CD_MDEFORMVERT, CD_CALLOC,
00267                                            NULL, numVerts, wmd->defgrp_name_a);
00268         /* Ultimate security check. */
00269         if (!dvert)
00270             return dm;
00271 
00272     /* Find out which vertices to work on. */
00273     tidx = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(int) * numVerts, "WeightVGMix Modifier, tidx");
00274     tdw1 = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(MDeformWeight*) * numVerts, "WeightVGMix Modifier, tdw1");
00275     tdw2 = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(MDeformWeight*) * numVerts, "WeightVGMix Modifier, tdw2");
00276     switch (wmd->mix_set) {
00277     case MOD_WVG_SET_A:
00278         /* All vertices in first vgroup. */
00279         for (i = 0; i < numVerts; i++) {
00280             MDeformWeight *dw = defvert_find_index(&dvert[i], defgrp_idx);
00281             if (dw) {
00282                 tdw1[numIdx] = dw;
00283                 tdw2[numIdx] = defvert_find_index(&dvert[i], defgrp_idx2);
00284                 tidx[numIdx++] = i;
00285             }
00286         }
00287         break;
00288     case MOD_WVG_SET_B:
00289         /* All vertices in second vgroup. */
00290         for (i = 0; i < numVerts; i++) {
00291             MDeformWeight *dw = defvert_find_index(&dvert[i], defgrp_idx2);
00292             if (dw) {
00293                 tdw1[numIdx] = defvert_find_index(&dvert[i], defgrp_idx);
00294                 tdw2[numIdx] = dw;
00295                 tidx[numIdx++] = i;
00296             }
00297         }
00298         break;
00299     case MOD_WVG_SET_OR:
00300         /* All vertices in one vgroup or the other. */
00301         for (i = 0; i < numVerts; i++) {
00302             MDeformWeight *adw = defvert_find_index(&dvert[i], defgrp_idx);
00303             MDeformWeight *bdw = defvert_find_index(&dvert[i], defgrp_idx2);
00304             if (adw || bdw) {
00305                 tdw1[numIdx] = adw;
00306                 tdw2[numIdx] = bdw;
00307                 tidx[numIdx++] = i;
00308             }
00309         }
00310         break;
00311     case MOD_WVG_SET_AND:
00312         /* All vertices in both vgroups. */
00313         for (i = 0; i < numVerts; i++) {
00314             MDeformWeight *adw = defvert_find_index(&dvert[i], defgrp_idx);
00315             MDeformWeight *bdw = defvert_find_index(&dvert[i], defgrp_idx2);
00316             if (adw && bdw) {
00317                 tdw1[numIdx] = adw;
00318                 tdw2[numIdx] = bdw;
00319                 tidx[numIdx++] = i;
00320             }
00321         }
00322         break;
00323     case MOD_WVG_SET_ALL:
00324     default:
00325         /* Use all vertices. */
00326         for (i = 0; i < numVerts; i++) {
00327             tdw1[i] = defvert_find_index(&dvert[i], defgrp_idx);
00328             tdw2[i] = defvert_find_index(&dvert[i], defgrp_idx2);
00329         }
00330         numIdx = -1;
00331         break;
00332     }
00333     if (numIdx == 0) {
00334         /* Use no vertices! Hence, return org data. */
00335         MEM_freeN(tdw1);
00336         MEM_freeN(tdw2);
00337         MEM_freeN(tidx);
00338         return dm;
00339     }
00340     if (numIdx != -1) {
00341         indices = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(int) * numIdx, "WeightVGMix Modifier, indices");
00342         memcpy(indices, tidx, sizeof(int) * numIdx);
00343         dw1 = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(MDeformWeight*) * numIdx, "WeightVGMix Modifier, dw1");
00344         memcpy(dw1, tdw1, sizeof(MDeformWeight*) * numIdx);
00345         MEM_freeN(tdw1);
00346         dw2 = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(MDeformWeight*) * numIdx, "WeightVGMix Modifier, dw2");
00347         memcpy(dw2, tdw2, sizeof(MDeformWeight*) * numIdx);
00348         MEM_freeN(tdw2);
00349     }
00350     else {
00351         /* Use all vertices. */
00352         numIdx = numVerts;
00353         /* Just copy MDeformWeight pointers arrays, they will be freed at the end. */
00354         dw1 = tdw1;
00355         dw2 = tdw2;
00356     }
00357     MEM_freeN(tidx);
00358 
00359     org_w = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * numIdx, "WeightVGMix Modifier, org_w");
00360     new_w = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * numIdx, "WeightVGMix Modifier, new_w");
00361 
00362     /* Mix weights. */
00363     for (i = 0; i < numIdx; i++) {
00364         float weight2 = 0.0;
00365         org_w[i] = dw1[i] ? dw1[i]->weight : wmd->default_weight_a;
00366         weight2  = dw2[i] ? dw2[i]->weight : wmd->default_weight_b;
00367 
00368         new_w[i] = mix_weight(org_w[i], weight2, wmd->mix_mode);
00369     }
00370 
00371     /* Do masking. */
00372     weightvg_do_mask(numIdx, indices, org_w, new_w, ob, dm, wmd->mask_constant,
00373                      wmd->mask_defgrp_name, wmd->modifier.scene, wmd->mask_texture,
00374                      wmd->mask_tex_use_channel, wmd->mask_tex_mapping,
00375                      wmd->mask_tex_map_obj, wmd->mask_tex_uvlayer_name);
00376 
00377     /* Update (add to) vgroup.
00378      * XXX Depending on the MOD_WVG_SET_xxx option chosen, we might have to add vertices to vgroup.
00379      */
00380     weightvg_update_vg(dvert, defgrp_idx, dw1, numIdx, indices, org_w, TRUE, -FLT_MAX, FALSE, 0.0f);
00381 
00382     /* If weight preview enabled... */
00383 #if 0 /* XXX Currently done in mod stack :/ */
00384     if (do_prev)
00385         DM_update_weight_mcol(ob, dm, 0, org_w, numIdx, indices);
00386 #endif
00387 
00388     /* Freeing stuff. */
00389     MEM_freeN(org_w);
00390     MEM_freeN(new_w);
00391     MEM_freeN(dw1);
00392     MEM_freeN(dw2);
00393 
00394     if (indices)
00395         MEM_freeN(indices);
00396 
00397     /* Return the vgroup-modified mesh. */
00398     return dm;
00399 }
00400 
00401 static DerivedMesh *applyModifierEM(ModifierData *md, Object *ob,
00402                                     struct BMEditMesh *UNUSED(editData),
00403                                     DerivedMesh *derivedData)
00404 {
00405     return applyModifier(md, ob, derivedData, 0, 1);
00406 }

00409 ModifierTypeInfo modifierType_WeightVGMix = {
00410     /* name */              "VertexWeightMix",
00411     /* structName */        "WeightVGMixModifierData",
00412     /* structSize */        sizeof(WeightVGMixModifierData),
00413     /* type */              eModifierTypeType_NonGeometrical,
00414     /* flags */             eModifierTypeFlag_AcceptsMesh
00415                            |eModifierTypeFlag_SupportsMapping
00416                            |eModifierTypeFlag_SupportsEditmode
00417                            |eModifierTypeFlag_UsesPreview,
00418 
00419     /* copyData */          copyData,
00420     /* deformVerts */       NULL,
00421     /* deformMatrices */    NULL,
00422     /* deformVertsEM */     NULL,
00423     /* deformMatricesEM */  NULL,
00424     /* applyModifier */     applyModifier,
00425     /* applyModifierEM */   applyModifierEM,
00426     /* initData */          initData,
00427     /* requiredDataMask */  requiredDataMask,
00428     /* freeData */          NULL,
00429     /* isDisabled */        isDisabled,
00430     /* updateDepgraph */    updateDepgraph,

00432     /* dependsOnNormals */  NULL,

00435     /* foreachTexLink */    foreachTexLink,
00436 };
